Classes in ch.chnoch.thesis.renderer that implement SceneManagerInterface
 class AbstractSceneManager
          The AbstractSceneManager contains some common tasks and fields of a scene manager.
 class GraphSceneManager
          This is a possible implementation of how to manage a 3D-scene.
 class SimpleSceneManager
          A simple scene manager is a basic implementation of a SceneManagerInterface.
